abilities.name: Forecaster
abilities.description: This Pokémon transforms a weather condition into a particular one made weather affect moves less.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is holding an item, the item gains 1/5 of the user's base stat.

abilities.name: Beast Boost
abilities.description: It boosts an ally's most potent stat.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: While it is raining, spreads a random status ailment to the user's target.
